entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink CodeFixer tests are failing #88278
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.IO.FileSystem.Tests #88276
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Boolean and String should implement IFormattable #88275
  • OOM on System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteRawLargeJsonToStreamWithoutFlushing #88272
  • Timeout on System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize #88271
  • Uri.IsBaseOf(bool) not true by user info #88265
  • Remove EventPipe adapter from NativeAOT implementation #88262
    8.0.0
  • COM source generator Enumerator pattern #88253
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add async parse overloads for `JsonNode` and `JsonElement` #88248
    Future
  • Potential misunderstanding and misuses in Random.GetItems #88247
  • `StreamWriter.DisposeAsync` disposes the underlying `Stream` synchronously #88246
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IAsyncDisposable on `TextReader` #88244
    8.0.0
  • AppSettings.json change detection not working on Azure App Service (Linux) #88240
  • iOS App Terminated on suspending if file stream open #88239
  • [API Proposal]: Allow DoesConsoleSupportAnsi to be overridden on Windows by environment variable #88236
    Future
  • Missing CI test coverage for Vector512 #88233
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/processinfo3/processinfo3/processinfo3.sh #88225
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogMessagesTests.CanReadAndWriteMessages #88224

Closed

  • Light up `Span` with `Vector512` code paths. #80824
    8.0.0
  • Span indexer doesn't elide bounds check when span initialized from an RVA static #13464
    8.0.0
  • OSX/x64: TargetOS::IsMacOS returns false in jit codebase #87794
    8.0.0
  • Failure running dotnet-pgo during linux-x64 build #88274
  • [Webassembly] dotnet/runtime update broke the aspnetcore build #88250
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IHostedLifecycleService` to support additional callbacks #86511
    8.0.0
  • Enum ToString difference between .NET 6 and .NET 8 #88269
  • [API Proposal]: QuicError.AddressNotAvailable #76435
    8.0.0
  • Treat NFloat as an interop intrinsic type in the interop generators #88229
    8.0.0
  • IHttpClientBuilder should have extension to redact query parameter from logging #68675
    Future
  • Modify HttpClientFactory based HttpClient request logging #44411
    Future
  • Ability to disable default http request logging #85840
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23316.32] Applications failed with Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #87807
    Future
  • Type.GetProperties does not return non-public properties from inherited type on Android #86149
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add json option to fallback to parsing value from string if type implements `IParsable/ISpanParsable` and enable it by default #88206
  • [API Proposal]: udate QuicError values #87259
    8.0.0
  • Task.Delay(Timeout.Infinite, cancellationToken) does not return when cancellation is requested #88044
  • 'System.TypeLoadException' occurred in Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.dll #88226
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Guid Marshalling Support #87894
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImport with CLong produces SYSLIB1051 and requires disabling runtime marshalling #73975
    8.0.0
  • windows-x86 release MSBuild_CMake is failing #88172
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Tar: Fix PAX regression when handling the size of really long unseekable data streams #88280
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter thread safety infrastructure #88279
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump git-commit-info from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 in /src/mono/wasm/runtime #88270
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix Out of memory with source gen tests #88266
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Add temp cindex attribute to build on xcode 15 #88261
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add C library detection to processinfo3 test #88260
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISCV] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NO MERGE] Expriments with QuicStream sending #88256
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithAddedModifier #88255
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix OptionsValidator source-gen to skip static and const members #88254
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Implement ICollection<T> on several LINQ iterators #88249
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot] Add Native AOT cross-build support for iOS-like platforms #88242
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make DoesConsoleSupportAnsi respect DOTNET_SYSTEM_CONSOLE_ALLOW_ANSI_COLOR_REDIRECTION #88241
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Unify JIT interface getTypeLayout between VM and crossgen2; refine what is considered "significant padding" #88238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #88237
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Expose stack trace metadata stripping as a supported option #88235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #88232
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Tar: set directory modification times while extracting. #88231
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add support to specify substitutions externally #88230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't set patchpoints in methods with CORINFO_DEBUG_CODE #88227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Clean up Guid.DecodeByte #88267
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix build failures when declaring a COM-style enumerable type #88263
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix missing braces #88264
    bug, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add IHostedLifecycleService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, 8.0.0
  • Delete stale SkipOnTargetFramework attributes (and a few tests) #88251
    needs-area-label
  • Simplify LINQ Shuffler test helper #88252
    area-System.Linq
  • Rename JITAllowOptionalRelocs to JitEnableOptionalRelocs #88243
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove code in nativeaot event trace files under !FEATURE_NATIVEAOT or FEATURE_DTRACE #88258
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #88211
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add NFloat as an interop intrinsic for the source generator #88257
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Update CompilerPlatformTestingVersion version #88221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Tweak the register order for xarch to better account for callee saved #88151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.8
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection debugging #88082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion store decomposition slightly #88182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update QuicError #88234
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2212435 #88219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't emit nor generate the manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #86850
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable Aot and Trim analyzers when building runtime tests #88209
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][perf] Simplify the build process for the perf measurements #88201
    area-Infrastructure, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Specially consider CLong, CULong and Guid strictly blittable #88213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Use wasm if opcode for null checks and conditional branches #88114
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade to LLVM 16 & C++17, and bundle libc++ on Linux #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Apply a number of improvements and bugfixes to JsonNode #88194
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Dedup Task.WhenAll non-generic and generic implementations #88154
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] refactoring wbt a bit #88218
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Create a doc outlining ownership rules for the ComInterfaceGenerator #88203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Workaround for insufficiently sized destination buffer #88184
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix for 84564 #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • fix TLS resume with HttpClientHandler on Linux #88214
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [CI test] SearchValues<string> #88166
    NO-REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add clr.tools subset to runtime-community #88160
    area-Infrastructure, arch-s390x
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
